TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ListViewSelectionMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Selection modes for list view controls on UWP.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.WindowsSpecific.ListViewSelectionMode Accessible = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the Narrator and keyboard can interact with the list view. This is the default behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.WindowsSpecific.ListViewSelectionMode Inaccessible = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that neither the Narrator nor the keyboard can interact with the list view.
